sentences.en: ...the discrepancy between press and radio reports.
sentences.cn: …报刊报道与广播报道之间的差异。

sentences.en: A greater cause for resentment is the discrepancy in pay.
sentences.cn: 导致愤怒的更主要原因是报酬上的差异.

sentences.en: A modification of the common - origin theory accounts for the density discrepancy.
sentences.cn: 关于共同起源的理论,有一种改进的论点解释了密度的不符.

sentences.en: A modification of the common-origin theory accounts for the density discrepancy .
sentences.cn: 关于共同起源的理论，有一种改进的论点解释了密度的不符。

sentences.en: At other times the discrepancy was of the order of 20%.
Further analysis and observations will almost surely resolve this discrepancy.
sentences.cn: 进一步的分析和观察肯定能够解决这种分歧.

sentences.en: He had another " discrepancy " about him . He was always wanting us to buy things.
sentences.cn: 他还有个 “ 美中不足 ”; 老要我们买东西.

sentences.en: Shakespeare did not acquiesce in discrepancy.
sentences.cn: 莎士比亚对于分歧并不是采取默认的态度.

sentences.en: Sir, as between clothes and countenance, you are all right, there is no discrepancy.
sentences.cn: 万岁爷, 就衣服与容貌而论, 您倒毫无问题, 并不至于自相矛盾.

sentences.en: That discrepancy does not exist presently.
sentences.cn: 这种差异目前并不存在。

sentences.en: The energy equivalent of the mass discrepancy in a nucleus is called binding energy.
sentences.cn: 与原子核中的质量差相对应的能量叫做原子核的结合能.

sentences.en: There is some discrepancy between your records and ours.
sentences.cn: 你的记录与我们的有些不同.

sentences.en: There remains a tiny discrepancy between theory and observation.
sentences.cn: 理论和观测之间仍存在很小的差异.

sentences.en: There was a discrepancy in the two reports of the accident.
sentences.cn: 关于那次事故的两则报道有不一致之处.

sentences.en: There was a discrepancy in the two reports.
sentences.cn: 在两个报告中有不一致之处。

sentences.en: There was considerable discrepancy between the two accounts of the battle.
sentences.cn: 两份关于那次战役的报道大有出入.

sentences.en: We must bear in mind the possible discrepancy between the effect desired and the effect produced.
sentences.cn: 我们不能不估计到所寻求的效果和实际发生的效果之间可能不一致.

words.tran_cn: 有差异的；相差的；矛盾的

trans.tran_en: a difference between two amounts, details, reports etc that should be the same
